basic.Peptide Name: Smp43 (scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Active against B. subtilis NCIMB 8024 (MIC 4 ug/ml), S. epidermidis sp., S. aureus SH100 (MIC 32-64 ug/ml), E. coli JM109, K. pneumoniae NCTC 13439, and C. albicans (MIC 64-128 ug/ml).
